nodes.documentation: Any winner can chose to donate their jackpot
nodes.name: donateJackpot

nodes.documentation: Dev revenue withdrawal function
nodes.name: withdrawRevenue

nodes.documentation:
Dev charity transfer function - sends all of the charity balance to the pre-set charity address
 Note that there's nothing stopping the devs to wait and set the charity beneficiary to their own address
 and drain the charity balance for themselves. We would not do that as it would not make sense and it would
 damage our reputation, but this is the only "weak" spot of the contract where it requires trust in the devs
nodes.name: sendCharityETH

nodes.documentation: This allows the owner to withdraw surplus ETH
nodes.name: redeemSurplusETH

nodes.documentation: This allows the owner to withdraw surplus Tokens
nodes.name: redeemSurplusERC20

nodes.documentation: withdraw surplus ETH
nodes.name: withdrawBaseETH

nodes.documentation: withdraw surplus tokens
nodes.name: withdrawBaseERC20

Setters
 Set button parameters
nodes.name: setButtonParams

nodes.documentation: Fractions must add up to 100%, and can only be set every 2 weeks
nodes.name: setAccountingParams

nodes.documentation: Charity beneficiary can only be changed every 13 weeks
nodes.name: setCharityBeneficiary
